Add slash commands dropdown to StatusActionBadge
Add slash commands dropdown to StatusActionBadge
Add slash commands dropdown to StatusActionBadge

summary: Extended StatusActionBadge with showCommands and onCommand props
Added collapsible All Commands dropdown with slide transition
Consolidated standalone Start/Complete/Done buttons into unified badge
Fixed redundant namespace display in RuleEditor command dropdown

suggestedTasks.title: Add keyboard shortcuts for common slash commands
suggestedTasks.description: Allow users to trigger /jat:start, /jat:complete, etc. via keyboard shortcuts in the dashboard
suggestedTasks.reason: Natural UX enhancement now that commands are visible in dropdown

suggestedTasks.title: Add command search/filter in StatusActionBadge dropdown
suggestedTasks.description: When there are many commands, allow filtering by typing. Reuse pattern from CommandPalette.
suggestedTasks.reason: Commands list will grow; filtering improves discoverability

patterns: Commands fetched lazily via /api/commands when dropdown opens
Use showCommands={true} and onCommand={sendWorkflowCommand} to enable
gotchas: Commands API returns namespace - only show (local) suffix for local commands
